exceptions.tactic: intros T s1 s2 H1 H2.
intros T' s1 s2 H1 H2.
intros T' s1' s2 H1 H2.
intros T' s1' s2' H1 H2.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros T s1 s2 H1 H2. unfold chain_closed, PredI, chain_closure in *. intros Hc1 Hc2. split. - split. + apply H1. + apply H2. - intros d Hd. apply Hc2. intros t Ht Hc. apply H1 in Ht. apply H2 in Ht. apply Hd. apply Ht.
